summary: Skyrim is a wild, cold region of Tamriel so I\'ve made this configuration for ENB v0.114 to give the sense of cold to the player.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

[img]http://s14.postimage.org/7qi9rkg9d/titolo.jpg[/img][/center]

- Fast and quality SSAO
- Fully suitable for midrange PCs
- Dark nights and dungeons
- No high contrasts
- Depth Of Field
- Exterior lighting dramatically depends on weather
- Completely worked from scratch

[center][img]http://s7.postimage.org/mwnyagm2j/img1.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://s16.postimage.org/3xkz6ku1h/img3.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://s11.postimage.org/ysle4otgz/img2.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://s18.postimage.org/9g0jr3fw9/img4.jpg[/img][/center]

* CONCEPT *

Skyrim is a wild, cold region of Tamriel so I\'ve made this configuration for ENB v0.114 to give the feel of cold to the player.

[center][img]http://s17.postimage.org/g5c6rq9qn/Screen_Shot62.jpg[/img][/center]

* RECOMMENDED MODS FOR THIS ENB CONFIG *

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19933]Volrath Enhanced Lights and Fixes[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20100]Sunglare disabler[/url]

* INSTALL *

Download the ENB binaries from ENB site and install files into your Skyrim folder (not data).
Make sure you\'re download the v0.114. Here the [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0114.htm]link[/url].
Download my ENB configuration and install files into your Skyrim folder too and overwrite existing files.

* CREDITS *
Boris Vorontsov who made the ENB - www.enbdev.com


* CHECK ALSO MY OTHER ENB CONFIG *

[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/titolo.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20050]Vivida ENB[/url][/center]
author: MannyGT

files.name: Cold Skyrim ENB 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Better contrasts
Better and \"poetic\" nights
More cold!
